caption.p: Presence of drug resistance mutations by location (A) and by risk factor (B) for 1,397 patients with HIV, Germany, 2001â€“2018. DRM, drug resistance mutation; HTS, heterosexual; MSM, men who have sex with men; NNRTI, nonnucleoside reverse transcriptase inhibitor; NRTI, nucleoside reverse transcriptase inhibitor; PWID, persons who inject drugs.
